data.name: Cheat sheet
data.explanation: A Chest sheet is a concise set of notes used for quick reference.
data.explanationTw: 有一個鮮明的主題搭配簡單的解釋的小紙。

data.name: Tic-tac-toe
data.explanation: A paper-and-pencil game for two players who take turns marking the spaces in a three-by-three grid with X or O. The player who succeeds in placing three of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row is the winner. It is a solved game, with a forced draw assuming best play from both players.

data.name: MBA
data.explanation: A postgraduate degree focused on business administration.
data.explanationTw: 企管的碩士，常常跟 EMBA 搞混，但其實 MBA 就是正常的研究生， EMBA 則專指高階主管在職進修。

data.name: FIFO
data.explanation: A method for organizing the manipulation of a data structure (often, specifically a data buffer) where the oldest (first) entry, or "head" of the queue, is processed first. In other words, it represent first in first out
data.explanationTw: 在電腦科學領域， FIFO 代表第一個進去的將會第一個出來。

data.name: LIFO
data.explanation: A method for organizing the manipulation of a data structure (often, specifically a data buffer) where the newest (lest) entry, is processed first. In other words, it represent lest in first out
data.explanationTw: 在電腦科學領域， LIFO 代表最後一個進去的將會第一個出來。

data.name: GTD
data.explanation: A personal productivity system developed by David Allen and published in a book of the same name. it is described as a time management system. Allen states 'there is an inverse relationship between things on your mind and those things getting done'.
data.explanationTw: 一種處理事情的方法，態度，系統，重點在於 TODO list。

data.name: Procrastination
data.explanation: The action of unnecessarily and voluntarily delaying or postponing something despite knowing that there will be negative consequences for doing so.

data.name: Eat the Frog
data.explanation: Identify one important task for the day and do it first.
data.explanationTw: 持之以恆的做一件小事。

data.name: A11y
data.explanation: nabling as many people as possible to use websites, even when those people's abilities are limited in some way.
data.explanationTw: 讓所有人都可以存取網站，就算有些人是有障礙的。
